dmca.title: BayTSP DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

On behalf of Fox Broadcasting Company and/or its subsidiaries and affiliated companies ("FOX "), I am writing to notify Blogger.com of the infringement of FOX's intellectual property rights in the below-referenced properties on the Blogger.com website and to demand that you take immediate action to stop such infringements.  

The below links are specific examples of Blogger.comweb pages currently broadcasting, streaming and/or linking to video files that infringe upon FOX's intellectual property rights.

FOX hereby demands that Blogger.com immediately disable access to and delete from its servers all unauthorized copies of works in which Fox owns exclusive rights on the Blogger.com website of which you are aware, including the infringing files identified below.  To the extent that multiple different copies of the infringed properties described below can be found on and through your service, you are required to act expeditiously to remove or disable access to all such infringing copies.

American Idol
Evidentiary Information:
Notice ID: 455-106
URL: http://livestreamsource.blogspot.com/2010/01/watch-fox-channel-live-online.html
Initial Infringement Timestamp: 20 Jan 2012 01:16:46 GMT
Infringers IP Address (if applicable): 74.125.127.132



The undersigned has a good faith belief that use of the materials in the manner described herein on Blogger.com is not authorized by FOX, its agent or the law. The information in this notice is accurate. Under penalty of perjury, the undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of FOX with respect to this matter.

This letter is not a complete statement of FOX's rights in connection with this matter, and nothing contained herein constitutes an express or implied waiver of any rights, remedies, or defenses of FOX in connection with this matter, all of which are expressly reserved.  

Regards,

[redacted] Esq.
In-House Counsel
Irdeto (fka BayTSP.COM Inc.) - as an Authorized Agent of Fox Broadcasting Company.
3255-3 Scott Blvd. Suite 101 Santa Clara, CA 95054
Phone: 408-492-8500  fax: 408-727-6743
fox_ugc@copyright-compliance.com <mailto:fox_ugc@copyright-compliance.com>

*pgp public key is available on the key server at http://pgp.mit.edu
 
Note:  The information transmitted in this Notice is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material.  Any review, reproduction, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon, this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited.  If you received this in error, please contact the sender and delete the material from all computers.
 
This infringement notice contains an XML tag that can be used to automate the processing of this data.  If you would like more information on how to use this tag please contact Irdeto.

- ---Start ACNS XML
